title: Ariat Men's Yellowstone M5 Rider Slim Straight Jean
description: Every rancher’s wardrobe starts with a great pair of jeans. This pair was designed by Ariat in collaboration with world-renowned Yellowstone costume designer Johnetta Boone, bringing rugged Dutton style to Ariat's cowboy-favorite denim.
Outfitted with authentic Western details, the M5 Yellowstone Rider has a vintage look and gets better with every wear.
No-rub comfort inseam with flat construction and heavy-duty zipper and hardware.
Extra deep front pockets. Straight through seat and thigh. Mid rise.
18 ½" straight leg opening for a slimmer fit over boots. 12.75 oz ring-spun denim. 100% Cotton.

Every rancher’s wardrobe starts with a great pair of jeans. This pair was designed by Ariat in collaboration with world-renowned Yellowstone costume designer Johnetta Boone, bringing rugged Dutton style to Ariat's cowboy-favorite denim. Outfitted with authentic Western details, the M5 Yellowstone Rider has a vintage look and gets better with every wear.
